question: I want to know, if I missed my Fajir prayer, and later in the morning I noticed the starting of my periods, is that fajir prayer 'qaza'? Do I have to repeat it? THirdly, if we pray in the car, is it better to repeat the prayer at home?
answer:
QUESTION

I want to know, if I missed my Fajir prayer, and later in the morning I noticed the starting of my periods, is that fajir prayer 'qaza'? Do I have to repeat it?  THirdly, if we pray in the car, is it better to repeat the prayer at home?

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh

1) If fajr salat was missed and the menses commenced after the time of fajr was over, then qadaa of that fajr prayer is necessary.

2) It is not permissible to pray fard salat in the car. One must make an all-out effort on a journey to stop and offer the salat normally. After exertion of all efforts, if one is unable to stop and offer the salat due to a genuine reason, then one should complete the salat in the car and repeat it thereafter when one is able to do so.

 

It is permissible to pray nafl salat in the car.

 

مسافر لا يقدر أن يصلي على الأرض لنجاستها وقد ابتلت الأرض بالمطر يصلي بالإيماء إذا خاف فوت الوقت

(Raddul Muhtar, Vol. 2, P. 41, HM Saeed)

 

وفي الخلاصة وفتاوى قاضي خان وغيرهما الأسير في يد العدو إذا منعه الكافر عن الوضوء والصلاة يتيمم ويصلي بالإيماء ثم يعيد إذا خرج.......... لأن هذا عذر جاء من قبل العباد فلا يسقط فرض الوضوء عنه ، فعلم منه أن العذر إن كان من قبل الله تعالى لا تجب الإعادة وإن كان من قبل العبد وجبت الإعادة

(Al-Bahr al-Raaiq, Vol. 1, P. 248, Rashidiyya)

(Tabyeen al-Haqaaiq, Vol. 1, P. 264, Darul Kutub)

(Fatawa Mahmudiyya, Vol. 7, P. 532, Faruqiyya)

And Allah knows best
